refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: GInetAddress represents an IPv4 or IPv6 internet address. Use g_resolver_lookup_by_name() or g_resolver_lookup_by_name_async() to look up the GInetAddress for a hostname. Use g_resolver_lookup_by_address() or g_resolver_lookup_by_address_async() to look up the hostname for a GInetAddress.
To actually connect to a remote host, you will need a GInetSocketAddress (which includes a GInetAddress as well as a port number).

refsect2.title: g_inet_address_new_from_string ()
refsect2.para: Parses string as an IP address and creates a new GInetAddress.

entry.para: a string representation of an IP address

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a new GInetAddress corresponding to string , or NULL if string could not be parsed. Free the returned object with g_object_unref().

refsect2.title: g_inet_address_new_from_bytes ()
refsect2.para: Creates a new GInetAddress from the given family and bytes . bytes should be 4 bytes for G_SOCKET_FAMILY_IPV4 and 16 bytes for G_SOCKET_FAMILY_IPV6.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a new GInetAddress corresponding to family and bytes . Free the returned object with g_object_unref().

refsect2.title: g_inet_address_new_any ()
refsect2.para: Creates a GInetAddress for the "any" address (unassigned/"don't care") for family .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a new GInetAddress corresponding to the "any" address for family . Free the returned object with g_object_unref().

refsect2.title: g_inet_address_new_loopback ()
refsect2.para: Creates a GInetAddress for the loopback address for family .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a new GInetAddress corresponding to the loopback address for family . Free the returned object with g_object_unref().

refsect2.title: g_inet_address_equal ()
refsect2.para: Checks if two GInetAddress instances are equal, e.g. the same address.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if address and other_address are equal, FALSE otherwise.

refsect2.title: g_inet_address_to_bytes ()
refsect2.para: Gets the raw binary address data from address .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a pointer to an internal array of the bytes in address , which should not be modified, stored, or freed. The size of this array can be gotten with g_inet_address_get_native_size().

refsect2.title: g_inet_address_get_native_size ()
refsect2.para: Gets the size of the native raw binary address for address . This is the size of the data that you get from g_inet_address_to_bytes().

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the number of bytes used for the native version of address .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a representation of address as a string, which should be freed after use.

refsect2.title: g_inet_address_get_is_any ()
refsect2.para: Tests whether address is the "any" address for its family.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if address is the "any" address for its family.

refsect2.title: g_inet_address_get_is_loopback ()
refsect2.para: Tests whether address is the loopback address for its family.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if address is the loopback address for its family.

refsect2.title: g_inet_address_get_is_link_local ()
refsect2.para: Tests whether address is a link-local address (that is, if it identifies a host on a local network that is not connected to the Internet).

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if address is a link-local address.

refsect2.title: g_inet_address_get_is_site_local ()
refsect2.para: Tests whether address is a site-local address such as 10.0.0.1 (that is, the address identifies a host on a local network that can not be reached directly from the Internet, but which may have outgoing Internet connectivity via a NAT or firewall).

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if address is a site-local address.

refsect2.title: g_inet_address_get_is_multicast ()
refsect2.para: Tests whether address is a multicast address.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if address is a multicast address.

refsect2.title: g_inet_address_get_is_mc_link_local ()
refsect2.para: Tests whether address is a link-local multicast address.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if address is a link-local multicast address.

refsect2.title: g_inet_address_get_is_mc_node_local ()
refsect2.para: Tests whether address is a node-local multicast address.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if address is a node-local multicast address.

refsect2.title: g_inet_address_get_is_mc_site_local ()
refsect2.para: Tests whether address is a site-local multicast address.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if address is a site-local multicast address.

refsect2.title: g_inet_address_get_is_mc_org_local ()
refsect2.para: Tests whether address is an organization-local multicast address.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if address is an organization-local multicast address.

refsect2.title: g_inet_address_get_is_mc_global ()
refsect2.para: Tests whether address is a global multicast address.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if address is a global multicast address.

refsect2.title: GInetAddress
refsect2.para: An IPv4 or IPv6 internet address.

refsect2.title: The “is-any” property
refsect2.para: Whether this is the "any" address for its family. See g_inet_address_get_is_any().

refsect2.title: The “is-link-local” property
refsect2.para: Whether this is a link-local address. See g_inet_address_get_is_link_local().

refsect2.title: The “is-loopback” property
refsect2.para: Whether this is the loopback address for its family. See g_inet_address_get_is_loopback().

refsect2.title: The “is-mc-global” property
refsect2.para: Whether this is a global multicast address. See g_inet_address_get_is_mc_global().

refsect2.title: The “is-mc-link-local” property
refsect2.para: Whether this is a link-local multicast address. See g_inet_address_get_is_mc_link_local().

refsect2.title: The “is-mc-node-local” property
refsect2.para: Whether this is a node-local multicast address. See g_inet_address_get_is_mc_node_local().

refsect2.title: The “is-mc-org-local” property
refsect2.para: Whether this is an organization-local multicast address. See g_inet_address_get_is_mc_org_local().

refsect2.title: The “is-mc-site-local” property
refsect2.para: Whether this is a site-local multicast address. See g_inet_address_get_is_mc_site_local().

refsect2.title: The “is-multicast” property
refsect2.para: Whether this is a multicast address. See g_inet_address_get_is_multicast().

refsect2.title: The “is-site-local” property
refsect2.para: Whether this is a site-local address. See g_inet_address_get_is_loopback().
